entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `oauth` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`user_id`))

indices.name: index_User_oauth
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_User_oauth` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`oauth`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`passage_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `book` TEXT, `chapter` INTEGER NOT NULL, `starting_verse` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ending_verse` INTEGER NOT NULL, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`passage_id`), FOREIGN KEY(`user_id`) REFERENCES `User`(`user_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_Passage_book_chapter_starting_verse_ending_verse
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Passage_book_chapter_starting_verse_ending_verse` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`book`, `chapter`, `starting_verse`, `ending_verse`)

indices.name: index_Passage_passage_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Passage_passage_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`passage_id`)

indices.name: index_Passage_user_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Passage_user_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id`)
